content: Does the NPP++ pluggin work with HAPI terminology server? I've a standalone terminology server (STU3) using UK SNOMED extension but when I try registering a new server I get 'element Conformance is not recognised as a valid resource name'
Guess you are using a DSTU2 based plugin to talk to a STU3 server. Not sure if there is a STU3 release for the Notepad++ plugin
I believe Anand is correct. To the best of my knowledge, Grahame hasn't release an STU3 version of the Notepad++ plugin yet.
update coming today or tomorrow that is entirely R3 based
terminology server will have to be R3, but I think that is already the case and the problem here?
done- there's a new release for upgrading
I assume thats a Jan R3 build
